wayambaa mathiwaranayedi api mathiwaranayata sudanam wenakota apata shabda wikashana yantha්ra pawichchi karannawath ida dunne naha.ketharam badhaka aawath janathawa wenuwen kese ho ape yuthukama ishta karannata api katayuthu kala bawa kiyanna kamathiyi.
rate mudal amathiwaraya hatiyata mata kiyanna puluwan janadhipathi maithripala sirisena kiyala thiyenne thambaa sathayak wath wiyadam karanna epa kiyala.

ee yaddith ara kiyapu pas kattuwa awith ethana galak uda thiyagena adiyak gahanawa..tikak thalaththani porawal thunakuyi apema wayase wage porawal dekakuyi.katitiyama ithin bamara padimin iddi .mamayi massinala dennayi ethenta bassama ahuwa ee ubala me paththeda kiyala .api kiwwa ow kiyala.un hena ujaruwen kiwwa api nam kalambu porawal .api kolambaa idan aawe kiyala.ita passe aaye passe apen ahuwa ubala koheda wada kiyala.mama kiwwa garij ekaka wada kiyala .podi masiya uu wadakarana kompaniye nama kiwwa loku masiya nithipathi eke kiwwa.
kawiyaku wana mata sakshikara andumakin sarasa yatharthaya hasu kara ganimata awashya ya.
